CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Ironwood Classic relative to Nova Games?
SRP.A: Ironwood Classic is {above} Nova Games in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Aether Cup Finals relative to Ironwood Classic?
SRP.A: Aether Cup Finals is {above} Ironwood Classic in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Crimson Clash relative to Ironwood Classic?
SRP.A: Crimson Clash is {above} Ironwood Classic in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total stadium attendance?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Aether Cup Finals}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total stadium attendance?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Ironwood Classic}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Ironwood Classic's maximum Stadium Attendance in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Ironwood Classic's maximum Stadium Attendance is in {1977}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Ironwood Classic's minimum Stadium Attendance in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Ironwood Classic's minimum Stadium Attendance is in {1985}.

NC.Q: Between 1978 and 1982, was the average total Stadium Attendance higher or lower than between 1983 and 1990?
NC.A: The average total stadium attendance between 1978 and 1982 was {lower} than between 1983 and 1990.

NC.Q: Between 1978 and 1985, was the average total Stadium Attendance higher or lower than between 1981 and 1986?
NC.A: The average total stadium attendance between 1978 and 1985 was {lower} than between 1981 and 1986.

NC.Q: Between 1976 and 1990, was the average total Stadium Attendance higher or lower than between 1976 and 1982?
NC.A: The average total stadium attendance between 1976 and 1990 was {lower} than between 1976 and 1982.

NC.Q: Between 1983 and 1984, was the average total Stadium Attendance higher or lower than between 1983 and 1990?
NC.A: The average total stadium attendance between 1983 and 1984 was {higher} than between 1983 and 1990.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Aether Cup Finals} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Aether Cup Finals and Crimson Clash first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Aether Cup Finals and Crimson Clash first exchanged leading positions in {1977}.
